channel.title: Love Lasts Forever
channel.description:
I've been working a lot more on text, trying to get better and better.
I started making a sig, trying out new things, etc. [IMG]http://img73.imageshack.us/img73/773/lovelastsigsu6.png[/img]
I got half way finished and was uninspired, but I really got into the text. ( Probably because I'm falling inlove with typography; http://browse.deviantart.com/?catpath=digitalart/text/typography/&order=9&alltime=yes&offset=24 ) I followed it up by doing a larger piece. [IMG]http://img398.imageshack.us/img398/3079/lovelastsoc7.png[/img]
Need some C&C, other things I could do, etc.

item.title: Love Lasts Forever
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Curiosity, where did the image in the sig come from?

Read full topic

item.title: Love Lasts Forever
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

The fact of the matter is, I’m just trying things out. I’m not going to waste 2 days on this editing trying to make it perfect when it’s just practice.
I may come back to it later, if I’m that bored.

I’m already working on some other typography which I’ll post in a moment. For the people that want the .PSD, link below. (Tag + LP)

http://www.mediafire.com/?xi299fd1nnz

Read full topic

item.title: Love Lasts Forever
item.dc:creator: @Doggie3342 Doggie3342
item.description:
@Doggie3342 wrote:

FastBawlz:

Now that I look at it, what I did with the last E in FOREVER looks horrible, but the F looks nice…

i dont think that either of those letters look good. i think that because its so simple and empty, youre trying to make it more complex, but i think it would be perfectly fine with separated letters. also, im not sure this would look good or not, but maybe you could try making the “O” in LOVE hollow (like an actual “o”, like you did in the sig) and putting a ripple in the middle of the o, or you could keep it solid and have the ripple almost in the center, just about 1/8 the width of the “O” left of the center, and 1/8 of the height of the “O” above the center.
sorry that was so strangely specific, i just envisioned what it might look like.

Read full topic

item.title: Love Lasts Forever
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

FastBawlz:

Now that I look at it, what I did with the last E in FOREVER looks horrible, but the F looks nice…

Yes. Also I don’t like the splash on the O. I think it would be better if it looked like the splash was coming from the O and no some other source. It just looks like you used a hairdryer on some wet paint.
I agree with what he said.

[quote=“exps35, post:4, topic:217795”]Maybe you could add somewhat of a liquify filter over the O, to make it look like it is the source of the splashing water?

just a thought.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Love Lasts Forever
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

i don’t know exps, i love the way it looks. the splash above forming from the O just sets off everything, to keep it from just being organized text. doing what you described would destroy its simple beauty.

Read full topic

just a thought.
